price: Saa na εteε, efrisε Nyankopͻn ne Nokorε no, na Ɔno na Ɔma owufoͻ nkwa, nokorԑ nso sԑ Ɔno na Ɔwͻ biribiara so tumi.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَأَنَّهُۥ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَأَنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha huwa al-ḥaqu wa-annahu yuḥ'yī al-mawtā wa-annahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
